content.en: Robotic control algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to improve control and performance in robotic systems. These algorithms include fuzzy wavelet networks, wavelet-based neural networks, adaptive wavelet neural network controllers, and more. By applying these algorithms, scientists aim to enhance position tracking, force control, trajectory tracking, and overall control performance in robot manipulators and mobile robots.
content.da: Robotstyringsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre styring og ydeevne i robotsystemer. Disse algoritmer omfatter fuzzy wavelet-netværk, wavelet-baserede neurale netværk, adaptive wavelet-neurale netværkskontrollere og flere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre positionstracking, kraftkontrol, banetracking og den overordnede kontrolydeevne i robotmanipulatorer og mobile robotter.
